channel.title: Legals on Creatures of War

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Briefing This privacy policy informs you about the gathering, currations, and intent of how Chaos Entertainment, email: Cretaceousawakening@gmail.com, wants to handle your private data. This Privacy Policy is in effect when you opt-in to the Creatures Of War newsletter via the (Field Operator Program), travel to the Creatures Of War website (www.creatureofwar.com), or while actually playing Creatures Of War. You will always be able to feel protected when you opt-in to giving us your private information.
